summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; amending Plat 19E, page 70 of the Official Land Use Map; rezoning property located at 3830 - 34th Avenue West from Neighborhood Commercial One/30 (NC1/30') to Neighborhood Commercial Two/30 (NC2/30') and accepting a Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith. (Petition of John Crull, CDS Inc., on behalf of James Penhollow; C.F. 296975)
